testcase.name: Submitting Contact Form
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the home page........................................passed Then Verify that the contact form is displayed with the following fields....passed Then Verify that the Send button is enabled.................................passed And Enter valid data in the Name, Email, and Subject fields.................passed And Leave the Phone Number and Company Name fields empty....................passed Then Enter a message in the Message field...................................passed Then Click on the Send button...............................................passed
